Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T25 Wall 55
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393608) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393608)
